description.en:
A deflationary token with positive Rebase on BSC

There are a total of 156 cycles, each cycle has a TAX amount on buy/sell and send TXs. The TAX starts at 5% and scales to 12% per cycle. The fee gradually increases as 1.275M tokens are burnt. Cycle comes to an end when we reach total 1.275M tokens burnt, 50% of the burn amount is distributed to holders, and 50% goes to permanent burn. Each new cycle starts at 5% tax.
